PART ONE . CHIBA CITY BLUES

1

" It 's like [my]539-someone body 's developed this massive drug defi- ciency . "[539-someone] It was a Sprawl voice and a Sprawl joke . [The Chatsubo]271-the chatsubo was [a bar for [professional expatriates]542-professional expatriates]541-a bar for professional expatriates ; [you]543-you could drink [there]544-there for a week and never hear two words in Japanese . [Ratz]272-ratz was [tending bar]545-tending bar , [his]272-ratz prosthetic arm jerking monoto- nously as [he]272-ratz filled a tray of glasses with draft Kirin . [He]272-ratz saw [Case]274-case and smiled , [his]272-ratz teeth a web work of East European steel and brown decay . " Maybe some business with [you]274-case , [Case]274-case ? "[272-ratz] [Case]274-case shrugged . [The girl to [his]274-case right]549-the girl to his right giggled and nudged [him]274-case . [The bartender]550-the bartender 's smile widened . [His]274-case ugliness was the stuff of legend . In an age of affordable beauty , there was something heraldic about [his]274-case lack of it . The antique arm whined as [he]274-case reached for another mug . It was a Russian military prosthesis , a seven - function force - feedback manipulator , cased in grubby pink plastic . " [You]274-case are too much [the artiste]2615-the artiste , [Herr Case]274-case . "[272-ratz] [Ratz]272-ratz grunted ; the sound served [him]272-ratz as laughter . [The Japanese]277-the japanese had already forgotten more neurosurgery than [the Chinese]554-the chinese had ever known . [The black clinics of [Chiba]3-chiba]555-the black clinics of chiba were the cutting edge , whole bodies of technique supplanted monthly , and still [they]555-the black clinics of chiba could n't repair the damage [he]274-case 'd suffered in [that Memphis hotel]556-that memphis hotel . A year here and [he]274-case still dreamed of cyberspace , hope fading nightly . All the speed [he]274-case took , all the turns [he]274-case 'd taken and the corners [he]274-case 'd cut in [Night City]4-night city , and still [he]274-case 'd see the matrix in [his]274-case sleep , bright lattices of logic unfolding across that colorless void .... [The Sprawl]59-the sprawl was a long strange way home over [the Pacific]5-the pacific now , and [he]274-case was [no console man]557-no console man , [no cyberspace cow- boy]558-no cyberspace cow- boy . Just [another hustler]559-another hustler , trying to make it through . But the dreams came on in the Japanese night like live wire voodoo and [he]274-case 'd cry for it , cry in [his]274-case sleep , and wake alone in the dark , curled in [his]274-case capsule in [some coffin hotel]560-some coffin hotel , [his]274-case hands clawed into the bedslab , temper foam bunched between [his]274-case fin- gers , trying to reach the console that was n't there .

" [I]272-ratz saw [[your]274-case girl]2627-your girl last night , "[272-ratz] [Ratz]272-ratz said , passing [Case]274-case [his]274-case second Kirin . Now , some night , [you]274-case get maybe too ar- tistic , [you]274-case wind up in [the clinic tanks]2631-the clinic tanks , spare parts . "[550-the bartender] " [You]274-case 're breaking [my]272-ratz heart , [Ratz]272-ratz . "[272-ratz] [He]272-ratz finished [his]272-ratz beer , paid and left , high narrow shoulders hunched beneath the rain- stained khaki nylon of [his]272-ratz windbreaker . Threading [his]272-ratz way through [the Ninsei crowds]562-the ninsei crowds , [he]272-ratz could smell [his]272-ratz own stale sweat .

[Case]274-case was twenty - four . At twenty - two , [he]274-case 'd been [a cowboy]563-a cowboy [a rustler]564-a rustler , [one of the best in the Sprawl]565-one of the best in the sprawl . [He]274-case 'd been trained by [the best]566-the best , by [McCoy Pauley]280-mccoy pauley and [Bobby Quine]281-bobby quine , legends in the biz . [He]274-case 'd operated on an almost permanent adrenaline high , a byproduct of youth and proficiency , jacked into a custom cy- berspace deck that projected [his]274-case disembodied consciousness into the con sensual hallucination that was the matrix . [A thief]567-a thief [he]274-case 'd worked for other , [wealthier thieves]568-wealthier thieves , employers who pro- vided the exotic software required to penetrate the bright walls of [corporate systems]569-corporate systems , opening windows into rich fields of data . [He]274-case 'd made the classic mistake , the one [he]274-case 'd sworn [he]274-case 'd never make . [He]274-case stole from [[his]274-case employers]570-his employers . [He]274-case kept something for [himself]274-case and tried to move it through a fence in [Amsterdam]6-amsterdam . [He]274-case still was n't sure how [he]274-case 'd been discovered , not that it mattered now . [He]274-case 'd expected to die , then , but [they]570-his employers only smiled . Of course [he]274-case was welcome , [they]570-his employers told [him]274-case , welcome to the money . And [he]274-case was going to need it . Because -- still smiling-- [they]570-his employers were going to make sure [he]274-case never worked again . [They]570-his employers damaged [his]274-case nervous system with a wartime Russian mycotoxin . Strapped to a bed in [a Memphis hotel]571-a memphis hotel , [his]274-case talent burning out micron by micron , [he]274-case hallucinated for thirty hours . The damage was minute , subtle , and utterly effective . For [Case]274-case , who 'd lived for the bodiless exultation of cyber- space , it was the Fall . In [the bars [he]274-case 'd frequented]572-the bars he 'd frequented as [a cowboy hotshot]573-a cowboy hotshot , the elite stance involved a certain relaxed contempt for the flesh . The body was meat . [Case]274-case fell into [the prison of [his]274-case own flesh]574-the prison of his own flesh .

[His]274-case total assets were quickly converted to New Yen , a fat sheaf of the old paper currency that circulated endlessly through the closed circuit of [the world]575-the world 's black markets like the seashells of [the Trobriand islanders]576-the trobriand islanders . It was difficult to transact legitimate business with cash in the Sprawl ; in [Japan]7-japan , it was already illegal . In [Japan]7-japan , [he]274-case 'd known with a clenched and absolute certainty , [he]274-case 'd find [his]274-case cure . In [Chiba]3-chiba . Either in [a registered clinic]577-a registered clinic or in [the shadow land of black medicine]578-the shadow land of black medicine . Synonymous with implants , nerve - splicing , and micro bionics , [Chiba]3-chiba was a magnet for [the Sprawl 's techno - criminal subcultures]579-the sprawl 's techno - criminal subcultures . In [Chiba]3-chiba , [he]274-case 'd watched [his]274-case New Yen vanish in a two - month round of examinations and consultations . [The men in [the black clinics]581-the black clinics]580-the men in the black clinics , [his]274-case last hope , had admired the expertise with which [he]274-case 'd been maimed , and then slowly shaken [their]580-the men in the black clinics heads . Now [he]274-case slept in the cheapest coffins , the ones nearest [the port]538-the port , beneath the quartz - halogen floods that lit [the docks]583-the docks all night like vast stages ; where [you]584-you could n't see the lights of [Tokyo]8-tokyo for the glare of the television sky , not even the towering hologram logo of [the Fuji Electric Company]585-the fuji electric company , and [Tokyo Bay]9-tokyo bay was [a black expanse where gulls wheeled above [drifting shoals of white styrofoam]587-drifting shoals of white styrofoam]586-a black expanse where gulls wheeled above drifting shoals of white styrofoam . Behind [the port]538-the port lay [the city]589-the city , [factory domes dominated by the vast cubes of corporate arcologies]590-factory domes dominated by the vast cubes of corporate arcologies . [Port]591-port and [city]592-city were divided by [a narrow borderland of [older streets]594-older streets]593-a narrow borderland of older streets , [an area with no official name]595-an area with no official name . [Night City]4-night city , with [Ninsei]11-ninsei [its]11-ninsei heart . By day , the bars down [Ninsei]11-ninsei were shuttered and featureless , the neon dead , the holograms inert , waiting , under the poisoned silver sky .

[Two blocks west of [the Chat]1-the chat]596-two blocks west of the chat , in [a teashop called [the Jarre de The , Case]598-the jarre de the , case]597-a teashop called the jarre de the , case washed down the night 's first pill with a double espresso . It was a flat pink octagon , a potent species of Bra- zilian dex [he]599-he bought from [one of [[Zone]275-zone 's girls]601-zone 's girls]600-one of zone 's girls . [The Jarre]602-the jarre was walled with mirrors , each panel framed in red neon . At first , finding [himself]599-he alone in [Chiba]3-chiba , with little money and less hope of finding a cure , [he]599-he 'd gone into a kind of terminal overdrive , hustling fresh capital with a cold intensity that had seemed to belong to [someone else]603-someone else . In the first month , [he]599-he 'd killed [two men]604-two men and [a woman]605-a woman over sums that a year before would have seemed ludicrous . [Ninsei]11-ninsei wore [him]599-he down until [the street]606-the street itself came to seem the externalization of some death wish , some secret poison [he]599-he had n't known [he]599-he carried . [Night City]4-night city was like a deranged experiment in social Dar- winism , designed by [a bored researcher who kept one thumb permanently on the fast - forward button]607-a bored researcher who kept one thumb permanently on the fast - forward button . Stop hustling and [you]608-you sank without a trace , but move a little too swiftly and [you]608-you 'd break the fragile surface tension of the black market ; either way , [you]608-you were gone , with nothing left of [you]608-you but some vague memory in the mind of [a fixture like [Ratz]272-ratz]609-a fixture like ratz , though heart or lungs or kidneys might survive in the service of [some stranger with New Yen for the clinic tanks]610-some stranger with new yen for the clinic tanks . Biz here was a constant subliminal hum , and death the accepted punishment for laziness , carelessness , lack of grace , the failure to heed the demands of an intricate protocol . Alone at a table in [the Jarre de The]12-the jarre de the , with the octagon coming on , pinheads of sweat starting from [his]599-he palms , suddenly aware of each tingling hair on [his]599-he arms and chest , [Case]274-case knew that at some point [he]599-he 'd started to play a game with [himself]599-he , a very ancient one that has no name , a final solitaire . [He]599-he no longer carried a weapon , no longer took the basic precautions . [He]599-he ran the fastest , loosest deals on [the street]606-the street , and [he]599-he had a reputation for being able to get whatever [you]608-you wanted . [A part of [him]599-he]612-a part of him knew that the arc of [his]599-he self - destruction was glaringly obvious to [[his]599-he customers]613-his customers , who grew steadily fewer , but that same part of [him]599-he basked in the knowledge that it was only a matter of time . And that was the part of [him]599-he , smug in its expectation of death , that most hated the thought of [Linda Lee]279-linda . [He]599-he 'd found [her]279-linda , one rainy night , in [an arcade]614-an arcade . Under bright ghosts burning through a blue haze of cigar- ette smoke , holograms of [Wizard 's Castle]13-wizard 's castle , [Tank War Europa]14-tank war europa , the [New York]15-new york skyline .... And now [he]599-he remembered [her]279-linda that way , [her]279-linda face bathed in restless laser light , features reduced to a code : [her]279-linda cheekbones flaring scarlet as [Wizard]283-wizard 's [Castle]16-castle burned , forehead drenched with azure when [Munich]284-munich fell to the Tank War , mouth touched with hot gold as a gliding cursor struck sparks from the wall of [a skyscraper canyon]615-a skyscraper canyon . [He]599-he was riding high that night , with a brick of [Wage]273-wage 's ketamine on its way to [Yokohama]17-yokohama and the money already in [his]599-he pocket . [He]599-he 'd come in out of the warm rain that sizzled across [the Ninsei pavement]616-the ninsei pavement and somehow [she]279-linda 'd been singled out for [him]599-he , one face out of [the dozens who stood at the consoles]617-the dozens who stood at the consoles , lost in the game [she]279-linda played . The expression on [her]279-linda face , then , had been the one [he]599-he 'd seen , hours later , on [her]279-linda sleeping face in a port side coffin , [her]279-linda upper lip like the line [children]618-children draw to represent a bird in flight . Crossing [the arcade]619-the arcade to stand beside [her]279-linda , high on the deal [he]599-he 'd made , [he]599-he saw [her]279-linda glance up . Gray eyes rimmed with smudged black paintstick . Eyes of some animal pinned in the headlights of [an oncoming vehicle]620-an oncoming vehicle . [Their]621-their night together stretching into a morning , into tickets at [the hover port]622-the hover port and [his]599-he first trip across [the Bay]18-the bay . The rain kept up , falling along [Harajuku]19-harajuku , beading on [her]279-linda plastic jacket , [the children of [Tokyo]8-tokyo]623-the children of tokyo trooping past [the famous boutiques]624-the famous boutiques in white loafers and cling wrap capes , until [she]279-linda 'd stood with [him]599-he in the midnight clatter of [a pachinko parlor]625-a pachinko parlor and held [his]599-he hand like [a child]626-a child . It took a month for the gestalt of drugs and tension [he]599-he moved through to turn those perpetually startled eyes into wells of reflexive need . [He]599-he 'd watched [her]279-linda personality fragment , calving like an iceberg , splinters drifting away , and finally [he]599-he 'd seen the raw need , the hungry armature of addiction . [He]599-he 'd watched [her]279-linda track the next hit with a concentration that reminded [him]599-he of the mantises [they]627-they sold in stalls along [Shiga]20-shiga , beside tanks of blue mutant carp and crickets caged in bamboo . [He]274-case spun and slammed the sole of [his]274-case nylon running shoe into the blue- lacquered composition door at the far end . It popped , cheap hardware falling from the splintered frame . Darkness there , the white curve of a terminal housing . Then [he]274-case was on the door to [its]733-its right , both hands around the transparent plastic knob , leaning in with everything [he]274-case had . [He]274-case made out a snake like loop of fiber optics protruding from a wall socket , a pile of discarded food containers , and the blade less nacelle of an electric fan . The window was a single pane of cheap plastic . [He]274-case shrugged out of [his]274-case jacket , bundled it around [his]274-case right hand , and punched . [It]738-it split , requiring two more blows to free it from the frame . Over the muted chaos of the games , an alarm began to cycle , triggered either by the broken window or by [the girl at the head of [the corridor]732-the corridor]739-the girl at the head of the corridor . [Case]274-case turned , pulled [his]274-case jacket on , and flicked the cobra to full extension . With the door closed , [he]274-case was counting on [his]274-case tail to assume [he]274-case 'd gone through the one [he]274-case 'd kicked half off [its]738-it hinges . The cobra 's bronze pyramid began to bob gently , the spring - steel shaft amplifying [his]274-case pulse . Nothing happened . There was only the surging of the alarm , the crashing of the games , [his]274-case heart hammering . When the fear came , it was like [some half - forgotten friend]741-some half - forgotten friend . Not the cold rapid mechanism of the dex - paranoia , but simple animal fear . [He]274-case 'd lived for so long on a constant edge of anxiety that [he]274-case 'd almost forgotten what real fear was . [This cubicle]742-this cubicle was the sort of place where [people]2641-people died . [He]274-case might die [here]2613-here . [They]2641-people might have guns .... And footsteps , unhurried , coming closer . Passing [his]274-case closed door . Pausing for the space of three rapid beats of [his]274-case heart . And returning . One , two , three . A bootheel scraped the matting . The last of [his]274-case octagon - induced bravado collapsed . [He]274-case snapped the cobra into its handle and scrambled for the window , blind with fear , [his]274-case nerves screaming . [He]274-case was up , out , and falling , all before [he]274-case was conscious of what [he]274-case 'd done . The impact with pavement drove dull rods of pain through [his]274-case shins . A narrow wedge of light from a half - open service hatch framed a heap of discarded fiber optics and the chassis of a junked console . [He]274-case 'd fallen face forward on a slab of soggy chip board , [he]274-case rolled over , into the shadow of the console . The cubicle 's window was a square of faint light . [It]1204-it could talk . And not in a synth - voice , but with a beautiful arrangement of gears and miniature organ pipes .
